title: How to Make Rainbow Fruit Salad

steps.headline: Prepare the fruit.
steps.description:
Make sure that all of it is washed, peeled, and sliced properly. If you find a different kind of a certain fruit, or find another kind of fruit to add, then add it. steps.headline: Add all the fruit to a large bowl.
steps.description: Make sure to mix it up.

steps.headline: Combine all the ingredients for the sauce and mix.
Pour honey orange sauce over the fruit just before serving.

text:
Prepare the fruit. Make sure that all of it is washed, peeled, and sliced properly. If you find a different kind of a certain fruit, or find another kind of fruit to add, then add it. Cut a Mango Cut Strawberries for Every Occasion Cut an Orange Peel an Orange Cut a Kiwi Peel a Kiwi{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b7\/Make-Rainbow-Fruit-Salad-Step-1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Rainbow-Fruit-Salad-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b7\/Make-Rainbow-Fruit-Salad-Step-1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-Rainbow-Fruit-Salad-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Add all the fruit to a large bowl. Make sure to mix it up. Combine all the ingredients for the sauce and mix. Pour honey orange sauce over the fruit just before serving. Finished.
sentences: Make sure that all of it is washed, peeled, and sliced properly.
If you find a different kind of a certain fruit, or find another kind of fruit to add, then add it.

Make sure to mix it up.
Combine all the ingredients for the sauce and mix.
Pour honey orange sauce over the fruit just before serving.
